title: Standing Rib Roast
ingredients: 1 (4 bone-in) standing rib roast from the loin end
directions: Put meat in a container with small holes and let dry in frige for 3 days.
Rub meat with salt and then oil.
Set oven to 250°, cook meat until center reaches 118° (About 5 hours).
Let meat sit until the temperature of the meat stops to rise.
